content.description: Assume mat is defined as follows.
content.question: int dim = 4; int[][] mat = new int[dim][dim]; Consider the following code segment. int sum = 0; for (int row = 0; row < dim; row++) { sum = sum + mat[row][dim - 1]; } Assume that mat contains the following values before the code segment is executed. Note that mat[0][3] is 2. 0 1 2 3 0 1 1 2 2 1 1 2 2 4 2 1 3 2 6 3 1 4 2 8 What value will sum contain after the code segment is executed?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
